successes.title: A New Way To Buy a Luxury Watch
successes.description:
No middlemen. No retail markups.
An obsessive focus on the details.
A new way to buy a luxury watch.

Pledges.description: Help launch the brand and receive a special acknowledgement on the website!
1 CLASSIC WATCH - Select any 1 of our 15 classic watches. These classic watches will retail for $95 - only during this Kickstarter campaign can you get yours for $70. Free Shipping in the USA.

1 CHRONOGRAPH WATCH - Select any 1 of our 3 chronograph watches. These chronograph watches will retail for $115 - only during this Kickstarter campaign can you get yours for $90.  Free Shipping in the USA.
2 CLASSIC WATCHES - Select any 2 of our 15 classic watches at our Kickstarter only pricing.  Free Shipping in the USA.
2 PACK MIX - Select any 1 of our 15 classic watches and any 1 of our 3 chronograph watches at our Kickstarter only pricing.  Free Shipping in the USA.
2 CHRONOGRAPH WATCHES - Select any 2 of our 3 chronograph watches at our Kickstarter only pricing.  Free Shipping in the USA.
3 CLASSIC WATCHES - Select any 3 of our 15 classic watches at our Kickstarter only pricing.  Free Shipping in the USA.
3 CHRONOGRAPH WATCHES - Select all 3 of our chronograph watches at our Kickstarter only pricing.  Free Shipping in the USA.
6 PACK MIX AND MATCH - Select any 6 watches from our entire classic and chronograph collections at our Kickstarter only pricing.  Free Shipping in the USA.
6 PACK MIX AND MATCH + HELP DESIGN OUR NEXT COLLECTION! Work with the Leonard & Church team and influence the direction of our next collection of handcrafted luxury timepieces.
